item.text: The Lord’s message came to me:

“Son of man, prophesy against the shepherds of Israel; prophesy, and say to them—to the shepherds: ‘This is what the Sovereign Lord says: Woe to the shepherds of Israel who have been feeding themselves! Should not shepherds feed the flock?

You <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> the <st data-num="02459" class="">fat</st>, you <st data-num="03847" class="">clothe</st> yourselves with the <st data-num="06785" class="">wool</st>, you <st data-num="02076" class="">slaughter</st> the <st data-num="01277" class="">choice animals</st>, but you do <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="07462" class="">feed</st> the <st data-num="06629" class="">sheep</st>!

You have <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="02388" class="">strengthened</st> the <st data-num="02470" class="">weak</st>, <st data-num="07495" class="">healed</st> the <st data-num="02470" class="">sick</st>, <st data-num="02280" class="">bandaged</st> the <st data-num="07665" class="">injured</st>, <st data-num="07725" class="">brought back</st> the <st data-num="05080" class="">strays</st>, <st data-num="03808" class="">or</st> <st data-num="01245" class="">sought</st> the <st data-num="06" class="">lost</st>, but with <st data-num="02394" class="">force</st> and <st data-num="06531" class="">harshness</st><n id="1" /> you have <st data-num="07287" class="">ruled over</st> them.

They were <st data-num="06327" class="">scattered</st> because they had <st data-num="01097" class="">no</st> <st data-num="07462" class="">shepherd</st>, and they <st data-num="01961" class="">became</st> <st data-num="0402" class="">food</st> for <st data-num="03605" class="">every</st> <st data-num="07704" class="">wild</st> <st data-num="02416" class="">beast</st>.<n id="1" />
My sheep wandered over all the mountains and on every high hill. My sheep were scattered over the entire face of the earth with no one looking or searching for them.
“‘Therefore, you shepherds, listen to the Lord’s message:

As surely as I live, declares the Sovereign Lord, my sheep have become prey and have become food for all the wild beasts. There was no shepherd, and my shepherds did not search for my flock, but fed themselves and did not feed my sheep.
Therefore, you shepherds, listen to the Lord’s message.

This is what the Sovereign Lord says: Look, I am against the shepherds, and I will demand my sheep from their hand. I will no longer let them be shepherds; the shepherds will not feed themselves anymore. I will rescue my sheep from their mouths, so that they will no longer be food for them.
“‘For this is what the Sovereign Lord says: Look, I myself will search for my sheep and seek them out.

As a <st data-num="07462" class="">shepherd</st> <st data-num="01243" class="">seeks out</st> his <st data-num="05739" class="">flock</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">when</st> he <st data-num="01961" class="">is</st> <st data-num="08432" class="">among</st> his <st data-num="06567" class="">scattered</st> <st data-num="06629" class="">sheep</st>, <st data-num="03651" class="">so</st> I will <st data-num="01239" class="">seek out</st> my <st data-num="06629" class="">flock</st>. I will <st data-num="05337" class="">rescue</st> them from <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="04725" class="">places</st> <st data-num="0834 08033">where</st> they have been <st data-num="06327" class="">scattered</st> on a <st data-num="06051" class="">cloudy</st>, <st data-num="06205" class="">dark</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st>.<n id="1" />

I will <st data-num="03318" class="">bring</st> them <st data-num="03318" class="">out</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> among the <st data-num="05971" class="">peoples</st> and <st data-num="06908" class="">gather</st> them <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> foreign <st data-num="0776" class="">countries</st>; I will <st data-num="0935" class="">bring</st> them <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> their own <st data-num="0127" class="">land</st>. I will <st data-num="07462" class="">feed</st> them <st data-num="0413" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="02022" class="">mountains</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st>, by the <st data-num="0650" class="">streams</st> and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="04186" class="">inhabited places</st> of the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st>.

In a <st data-num="02896" class="">good</st> <st data-num="04829" class="">pasture</st> I will <st data-num="07462" class="">feed</st> them; the <st data-num="02022" class="">mountain</st> <st data-num="04791" class="">heights</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> their <st data-num="05116" class="">pasture</st>. <st data-num="08033" class="">There</st> they will <st data-num="07257" class="">lie down</st> in a <st data-num="02896" class="">lush</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05116" class="">pasture</st>, and they will <st data-num="07462" class="">feed</st> on <st data-num="08082" class="">rich</st> <st data-num="04829" class="">grass</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="02022" class="">mountains</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st>.
I myself will feed my sheep and I myself will make them lie down, declares the Sovereign Lord.
I will seek the lost and bring back the strays; I will bandage the injured and strengthen the sick, but the fat and the strong I will destroy. I will feed them—with judgment!
“‘As for you, my sheep, this is what the Sovereign Lord says: Look, I am about to judge between one sheep and another, between rams and goats.

Is it <st data-num="04592" class="">not enough</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">for</st> you to <st data-num="07462" class="">feed</st> on the <st data-num="02896" class="">good</st> <st data-num="04829" class="">pasture</st> that you must <st data-num="07429" class="">trample</st> the <st data-num="03499" class="">rest</st> of your <st data-num="04829" class="">pastures</st> with your <st data-num="07272" class="">feet</st>? When you <st data-num="08354" class="">drink</st> <st data-num="04950" class="">clean</st> <st data-num="04325" class="">water</st>, must you <st data-num="07515" class="">muddy</st> the <st data-num="03498" class="">rest</st> of the water <st data-num="07515" class="">by trampling</st> it with your <st data-num="07272" class="">feet</st>?
As for my sheep, they must eat what you trampled with your feet and drink what you have muddied with your feet!
“‘Therefore, this is what the Sovereign Lord says to them: Look, I myself will judge between the fat sheep and the lean sheep.

<st data-num="03282" class="">Because</st> you <st data-num="01920" class="">push</st> with your <st data-num="06654" class="">side</st> and your <st data-num="03802" class="">shoulder</st>, and <st data-num="05055" class="">thrust</st> your <st data-num="07161" class="">horns</st> <st data-num="05055" class="">at</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="02470" class="">weak</st> sheep <st data-num="05704 0834">until</st> you <st data-num="06327" class="">scatter</st> them <st data-num="0413 02351">abroad</st>,<n id="1" />
I will save my sheep; they will no longer be prey. I will judge between one sheep and another.
“‘I will set one shepherd over them, and he will feed them—namely, my servant David. He will feed them and will be their shepherd.
I, the Lord, will be their God, and my servant David will be prince among them; I, the Lord, have spoken!
“‘I will make a covenant of peace with them and will rid the land of wild beasts, so that they can live securely in the wilderness and even sleep in the woods.

I will <st data-num="05414" class="">turn</st> them and the <st data-num="05439" class="">regions around</st> my <st data-num="01389" class="">hill</st> into a <st data-num="01293" class="">blessing</st>. I will make <st data-num="01653" class="">showers</st> <st data-num="03381" class="">come down</st> in their <st data-num="06256" class="">season</st>; they will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> <st data-num="01653" class="">showers</st> that bring <st data-num="01293" class="">blessing</st>.<n id="1" />

The trees of the field will yield their fruit and the earth will yield its crops. They will live securely on their land; they will know that I am the Lord, when I break the bars of their yoke and rescue them from the hand of those who enslaved them.

They will <st data-num="03808" class="">no</st> <st data-num="05750" class="">longer</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> <st data-num="0957" class="">prey</st> for the <st data-num="01471" class="">nations</st>, and the <st data-num="0776" class="">wild</st> <st data-num="02416" class="">beasts</st> will <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="0398" class="">devour</st> them. They will <st data-num="03427" class="">live</st> <st data-num="0983" class="">securely</st>, and <st data-num="0369" class="">no</st> one will <st data-num="02729" class="">make</st> them <st data-num="02729" class="">afraid</st>.

I will <st data-num="06965" class="">prepare</st> for them a <st data-num="07965" class="">healthy</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="04302" class="">planting</st>. They will <st data-num="03808" class="">no</st> <st data-num="05750" class="">longer</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> <st data-num="0622" class="">victims</st><n id="2" /> of <st data-num="07458" class="">famine</st> in the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> and will <st data-num="03808" class="">no</st> <st data-num="05750" class="">longer</st> <st data-num="05375" class="">bear</st> the <st data-num="03639" class="">insults</st> of the <st data-num="01471" class="">nations</st>.
Then they will know that I, the Lord their God, am with them and that they are my people, the house of Israel, declares the Sovereign Lord.
And you, my sheep, the sheep of my pasture, are my people, and I am your God, declares the Sovereign Lord.’”
